Name: Tango Cocktail (from the Bellagio)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Passion fruit liqueur, balanced by tart grapefruit and fortified with gin.
History: Adapted from a reipe discovered in 2003 at the Bellagio in Las Vegas, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Tango Cocktail (from the Bellagio) contains 218 calories
